projects.name: My Study Point Website
projects.description: Led the development of a custom website for a coaching institute, employing HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS for a captivating frontend experience. Actively implementing a backend solution using Django and MySQL, integrating a robust CRM system for improved customer relationship management and user authentication.

projects.name: CubeSolverX: C-Powered Rubiks Cube Solver
projects.description: Spearheaded the development of a Rubiks Cube Solver & Tutor in C in 2022, incorporating custom algorithms, optimized data structures, and file handling capabilities. Demonstrated expertise in C programming and problem-solving, delivering a user-friendly interface with step-by-step instructions and educational resources for a comprehensive user experience. Showcased proficiency in algorithm design, data structure optimization, and software development, enhancing readiness for future roles in the field.

experiences.description: Developed and executed a comprehensive online web development strategy, resulting in a visually appealing landing page with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, BootStrap for streamlined user-friendly forms, and a highly effective countdown timer. Utilized EmailJS to seamlessly integrate form submissions with client emails, enhancing communication efficiency.

full_output.name: Abhijeet Srivastava
achievements_and_awards: First Runner Up: Secured the distinguished position of First Runner Up in the KICCs D Hack Coding Competition, outperforming B.Tech 2nd Year and MCA peers.
3 Star @CodeChef: Distinguished as a 3-star programmer on CodeChef, boasting a peak rating of 1789, exemplifying expertise in competitive programming and algorithmic problem-solving.

Specialist @CodeForces: Attained a peak CodeForces rating of 1410, demonstrating expertise in solving complex algorithmic problems and optimizing code efficiency; competed in high-pressure programming challenges to enhance problem-solving capabilities.
LeetCode: Achieved a peak rating of 1744 on LeetCode.
Global Rank 58: Secured a global rank of 58 in a challenging 2-day long CodeChef competition.
